data.author: exahertz

changelog.release_notes:
Version 2.1.

Resolving issues with the configuration settings screen displaying a blank page.

Developer: Alex Frodyma
Email: exahertz22@hotmail.com

TeslaMotors Watchface Version 2.0.

Adding configuration settings including:
Paypal Donate button
Display temperature units (Celsius or Fahrenheit)
Enable/Disable temperature display
Enable/Disable Bluetooth connection icon and battery indicator
Enable/Disable 24 hour time format

Adding an informational splash screen at watchface start up.

Developed by Alex Frodyma.

If there are any issues or feature requests please contact the developer at the following email address: exahertz22@hotmail.com.
Fixed temperature updating. Changed the watchface firmware to match the weather website's new API requirements.

Tesla Motors watchface version 01.00.00.
Created by Alex Frodyma.

data.description:
Watchface inspired by Tesla Motors.
Created by Alex Frodyma.
